website_summaries.verdict: Produce creative work up to 12 inches long, and with a unique self-adjusting blade.
pros: One of the most customizable and precise machines available
Engineered for artists with technical personalities
Provides space for extra blades and pieces that help make each project an original
cons: Some customers note the software is not always compatible with PCs

customer_reviews.title: Hardware is great, software is buggy, company is difficult to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: I've had no issues with the Cameo 3 cutting machine itself, but Silhouette as a company is impossible to deal with. I purchased the additional upgrade to be able to cut directly from Illustrator and not mess with their software system. Unfortunately, the plugin breaks every time Adobe updates Illustrator. Silhouette is unresponsive to getting the plugin fixed and just offers to sell their Designer edition of their software which can import and cut vector files. It would be one thing if it was a free plugin, but it's not, and as a paid, premium product, I expect better service from companies I do business with.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my silhouette only to be majorly disappointed by its performance. I've successfully completed 3 tiny projects in the month and a half that I've had my silhouette. I've wasted more money than I care to say in vinyl, since my machine only cuts about half of a project at a time before "checking for connection" for a while... then dragging the blade back to the beginning position leaving a cut through the middle of the project. I'm done with this. I was trying to invest in a new tool to help add a little something to my furniture/decor jobs, but low and behold, I received a dud.
customer_reviews.author: TheMurphys

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead, pull the trigger!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to tell you the array of vinyl decals and t shirts I have already made with this product. Lives up to the hype, I am pleased with this cutter. Rollers can handle 12" or 15" vinyl sheets or rolls. If you're on the fence, take my word, pull the trigger, you won't be disappointed. Software is fantastic, I can literally take any image from the internet trace with the tracing function in the software and cut in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: arthur adams

customer_reviews.title: Best machine ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have the first silhouette machine, which is still working great and I still use it. I purchased the Cameo 3 about two months ago and I love everything about this machine. The selling point for me was the blue tooth and the auto blade. I use it to make stencils for wood projects, for iron on transfers, among many other craft projects. The designs you can make with this is endless. I work at a school and a teacher there purchased one just for her classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is non existent for this company
customer_reviews.text: You cannot talk to a human if you have a problem. I have spent more than 4 hours on their chat line just trying to connect my computer to blue tooth.And it's still not connected. They close at 5:00 and then they disappear. I will ask a question and they will get back to me 30-45 minutes later with something to check and then again and again. I have seen wait times on the chat line be 2 hours. Until they get their customer service fixed I would not buy this machine. And Silhouette used to be such a good company.
customer_reviews.author: pie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of steps to accomplish a simple task of just ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of steps to accomplish a simple task of just cutting paper. Not iser friendly for explanation and instruction o How to use the features. Not compatible with other fonts forcing to biy the silhouette product. You tube will be your friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: It took google to figure out how to install the blade properly since there are no directions with the machine and I couldn’t figure it out through the install software. Once I got that down, I’ve been having fun designing and cutting vinyl, htv, and paper. The computer software is pretty easy to use, especially compared to my old cutter (a craft robo- the silhouette’s predecessor). I occasionally have to adjust the auto settings as they aren’t perfect but that is quick and easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: 64727d

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I use to own the silhouette portrait and although I experienced a few difficulties they were never as bad as the experience I'm having with the Cameo 3. The bluetooth is erratic, the blade doesn't always adjust to cutting settings, the bar that is meant to hold down the mat and paper doesn't hold tight. It takes an hour for support to answer their calls. At this point I assume it's because there are too many customers having similar problems Overall I have wasted more time with this machine than it is worth!
customer_reviews.author: cit

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love this Machine!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! This is my first vinyl cutter to own and I was able to have it out of the box, set up and cutting within sheer minutes of receiving the machine. Very easy to set up, super simple to use. I chose it over the Cricut because you can use a whole roll of vinyl with the Cameo 3 and the software is more powerful and allows you to do more. Already used it to make many stencils fro woodworking projects and I love it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jrgoldman11

customer_reviews.title: I love my silhoutte I've done a few shirts already and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my silhoutte I've done a few shirts already and it works great. Installing it only took like 30-40 min max. Learning to use it was a little more complicated ! YouTube will help you best!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love! Oh the crafting you can do!
customer_reviews.text: The crafts you can do with this are only limited by your imagination! ....Or by the amount of time your husband will allow you to lock yourself in your craft room. Either way this thing is great! I haven't had any issues with mine. I highly reccomend it if you love to do crafts. Get on YouTube and look up videos to help you learn how to do different things with it -you would never realize it could do so many neat things!
customer_reviews.author: Night Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic machine. I do have to say, however, that there is a learning curve with how to use the software. I highly recommend watching You tube videos to learn. Once you do that, you should be fine. It's a great machine that can do miracles with everything from vinyl, card stock, HTV, you name it! Once you get the hang of it, it is super fun! I'm definitely glad I bought the Silhouette over the Cricut.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Martin

customer_reviews.title: So much fun, and great for all kinds of projects
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to setup. There are a ton of tutorials from the company and people willing to share how to use almost every aspect of the cutter and the software on their website and on YouTube. I would recommend taking the default autoblade settings and cutting them in half for the force to start with. You will learn the different material settings that work best for you very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Montana M.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, needs a more in-depth software
customer_reviews.text: If you are used to Photoshop or flash studio or any cad programs the software is super simple in comparison. The software is easy to use but lacks the options most other designer studio programs offer.... especially hotkeys or key mapping for faster processing. However the machine itself is a beast and does the jobs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: brian wagner

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to comprehend how to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I had this machine for a month before taking it out and attempting to use it. It set there for another few months. I decided to learn or get rid of it. It has a huge learning curve and can be intimidating. I used a lot of vinyl trying to learn. Once I got the hang of the machine and the lingo, I managed a few cups and shirts. The company is very vague on certain aspects, therefore, I used You Tube and joined a FB group for help. I haven't learned to do anything else, but I will not let it get the best of me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price but....BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize (that darn fine print thing) this machine did not have bluetooth. Yes yes - It is bluetooth "compatible" but not included. Go figure. So now i have to go figure out an adapter and its VERY specific on the Silhouette web-site - if you get the wrong one it won't work. Very disappointed but don't want to start all over. If you really want bluetooth as we all know it - you will have some extra work and additional cost to make with this model.
customer_reviews.author: LizB

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't trade it for all the cricuts in the world.
customer_reviews.text: have had this product for several months and am still learning new things every day. i LOVE this machine and wouldn't trade it for all the cricuts in the world. the only issue that I've had with it was at no fault to Amazon nor the seller. shortly after receiving this Silhouette released their 4 model and with it came a studio upgrade which wreaked havoc on my system. however, i am in several "support" and "inspiration" groups on facebook and after reading through several posts i was able to revert my software to a slightly older version until they had worked many of the bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Potter

customer_reviews.title: Where are the set up instructions?
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I should have to go on Youtube or any other website to ensure that I'm setting this product up correctly. It couldn't have been that difficult to put set-up instructions in the package, and it feels very unprofessional to not do so.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Just get it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Im new to the Vinyl cutting game but this is a great C and C cutter. The program is easy to use and so meany ppl on youtube to show you how this works, made things so much better. I really happy with all it can do and how quick it is and really the only thing i would say it is a lil loud when it cuts but nothing crazy just makes sounds a of a machine cutting things. The amount of things this thing can do are so endless.
customer_reviews.author: CCS

customer_reviews.title: Loved my Cameo 2 but having too many issues with ...
customer_reviews.text: The LCD screen is not working and no support available. I'm stuck with a $250 product that I can't use. Loved my Cameo 2 but having too many issues with this one
customer_reviews.author: Diana Villavicencio

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse of a Machine.
customer_reviews.text: Tad bit of a learning curve, and you need to keep up on the blades. But My friends and I have already got a ton of mileage out of this thing! It has a bit of trouble doing smaller designs of any detail, but with some dedication and a bit of effort, you can make this baby do about anything!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It's actually a good product
customer_reviews.text: 3 recommendations: . Use hard rubber grip rollers . make fully adjustable rollers . Make better locks for the rollers. After so long I just got the chance to review. I like it but my recommendations stands. That's the only issue I'm having. But I modified my version to fix those issues anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Rdane

customer_reviews.title: Grate investment
customer_reviews.text: The only issue was that some of the smaller parts was missing either by accident of in transit but never the less they were not present but their to their words on shipment and amazon did a awesome job and retrieving the necessary tools that was missing and replacing them all and all the size the speed on the power up I could not be happier love this machine can’t wait to put in to use 💯♥️
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla pouncy

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Gift I’ve Ever Received
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift. I absolutely love it! I’d craft with it all day if that was possible. Take a day to set up the software before you expect to just just right in to a project when first opening it up. Downloading took a while. May just have been my computer though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: If you use a Mac, beware.
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it cuts very nice, beautiful. I have a new MacBook Pro, all the bells and whistles, running Catalina. My wife has an iMac, purchased 6 months ago same, OS etc. Problem is every time either of us sends a cut file, after it cuts, the Silhouette software crashes. To get it cleared, you have to do a force-quit in MAC-OS and restart. Make another cut, do it all over again. I could go into all the other issues with the software, but it would take too long.
customer_reviews.author: SteveF

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to do vinyl graphics on a larger scale and have to say that this little device is a lot of fun to mess with. I have done vinyl, yardstick and drawings on cardstock with ease. The software is easy to use!! I recommend to anyone wanting to tinker or bump up their hobby!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Super pricey and not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for over a month now. I’ve watched countless videos on YouTube of how to cut different products properly. Idk what is wrong with my machine but it slides literally everywhere and has yet to make a clean cut. I don’t want it. And now I feel I wasted a ton of money for not something I can’t even use.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Very disppointing purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Truly a horrible purchase. Wow, I thought I would get this to help out with my business. Ten plus hours later and a destroyed mat and this thing has yet to cut anything. Issue after issue after issue. Software crashing, registration marks not working, nonstop frustration. Horrible help page by silhouette. Zero instructions anywhere. You have to google everything and do youtube videos. What a costly mistake. Beyond frustrated with the quality of this product. I have tried so hard to make this work but what a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cattapan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly when I read reviews, got second opinions from other people I was hesitant. But I have has this for almost 3 weeks now and it has already been well loved and works like a charm! yes there is a learning curve, but that just depends on how quickly you can learn. I got it down within a couple hours. It just about playing with the software.
customer_reviews.author: Pati

customer_reviews.title: LOVe the wifi and this was right on time
customer_reviews.text: I love my new silhouette, it is a lot quieter and faster. The seller had it here right on time. The wifi works great and once I got use to the new placement of the icons it went great. Still I have to search for some. The only thing wrong with it is it does not come with a manual, I like things in my hands to read.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Stanfill

customer_reviews.title: Works for my crafty moments
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a Portrait 1 after Silhouette stopped supporting those. It is nice to have a larger cutting area but the Bluetooth is not what it should be. Overall it’s a nice machine and works well for my little crafty projects.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Student

customer_reviews.title: The quality for the price is not there
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend this product to anyone. This is the second one I have been through and stops cutting good after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly and the software is easy to install and use. The cutting mats should be used with caution and remember to change them since they don't last long if you keep cutting every day. I usually change them every 200 cuts but leave the "discarded ones" for other materials.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine for my business and with in a few months I purchased another for my partner. The Cameo 3 is just perfect for all my designs and custom orders. The trace button has saved me on a few occasion's when I can not get a certain design just right. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It is so much fun and easy to learn. Took me a couple months and I keep learning new things it can do. I bought this product when on sale and I would recommend waiting for it to go on sale. I would also buy the vinyl separate since some of the colors in the bundle, I don’t think I would use frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Kuderka

customer_reviews.title: Jack of all trades
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so easy to use. I have made so many different things. When I first got it I was like “ok so it can cut” but it is so much more then that. You can create so many things and pair it with other projects from other machines. Definitely worth the buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacobi Encalade

customer_reviews.title: Make all the Stickers!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. I surprised her with it for Christmas. She had some problems initially, but after watching youtube videos and joining some Facebook groups, she has learned a ton. She is now making vinyl stickers for all of the family's vehicles, and even made me a coffee mug. She loves it and is planning to start a shop with the things she makes.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Worley

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!! I bought this one after my cameo 2 quit working. Love the ease of use and the automated blade. Sometimes you have to adjust the cut depth in the program depending on the type of medium being used.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cameo 3
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Cameo 3 for the ease of the way it cuts. I have owned cameo orgianal since 2012 and never had a problem with it . The new one i have used only a few times and the touch screeen works only once in a while it starts out great and then freezes and i have to turn off and back on again and if im lucky it will work. very fursated as i need this to work Bought from amazon but its past the return date. Do not know what to do>
customer_reviews.author: hargett

customer_reviews.title: Said it was new.....it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: The ad I purchased this from claimed it was new and unused. It is absolutely not new. The top has scratches, the original packaging is scattered in the box and looks as if someone through it in there on top of the foam that is in pieces. Half of the stuff is missing that was advertised. Not instructions or paperwork whatsoever. Oh.... and did I mention the black animal fur that was on it. Very disappointed. It will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: shereen brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make shirt and I love it! It was fairly easy to set up and use. It works great. Just takes a little time getting use to it and learning how to do everything
customer_reviews.author: karley davis

customer_reviews.title: Good way to have a hobby or another stream of income
customer_reviews.text: i already made my money back using this machine and sticker viynl for companies logos and numbers. i just followed some youtube totoirials on "how to" for a day and yea its that simple. I even taught my wife how to use it along with silhouette studio in a day. its a good inventment, hobby, stream of income. and for the price you cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Rahman Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I've never been able to get the bluetooth to work. The only feature I've been able to use has been the print and cut. Using my scanner doesn't seem practical because my scanner is too small. I've had problems trying to use my phone to scan with it too. It only reads properly under a lot of light and then only registers correctly maybe half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Davila

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, watched a few YouTube videos and was creating stickers and decals in minutes. No limits with this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Motorhead

customer_reviews.title: 3.0 far exceed my previous Silbouette.
customer_reviews.text: I owned a previous version of the Silhouette and it was a nightmare. Non-stop bugs, terrible customer service. That machine was destroyed in a lightening storm. Despite the experience with the first machine, the potential of a properly functioning devicw made me go ahead and order the 3.0. I am happy to say, so far, I haven't encountered as many problems with this version. It cuts like a dream, but there are some issues with the Bluetooth or even getting the software to recognize the device. For this reason, I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love my cameo. Please know that there is a STEEP learning curve to learn to use it. Watch the you tube videos for tutorials. Do not purchase is you are not willing to pur the time in learning how to use the software.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Isenhour

customer_reviews.title: My favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning about all the features of this machine, but there is so much great information on the internet with tips, tricks, tutorials, and ideas that it has been super easy to learn!
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Silhouette bed cut
customer_reviews.text: My Silhouette does not cut anymore and at the moment I could not send the pictures to the support silhouette I would like to know if you can help me, what I should do because at this moment I do nothing with the machine the first one I bought also did not work returns and now it's suddently cut off and the right roller has a problem. The silhouette not resolve the problem but the Amazon told me return machine.Thanks. Eliana
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This machine did not work....I sent it back. The mat kept sliding all over the place the would not stay still. Sent the machine back for a full refund because I could not use it to do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Curry

customer_reviews.title: By from the Silhouette site!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it cut so deep even on setting 1 and renders it all useless all the letters got stuck individually onto the mat. But also I didnt get the Vinyl Crosscutter or the Blade Adjustment tool. By from the Silhouette site!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: There is a big learning curve with the software, especially if you are already use to the Design Space. Once you learn it, it expands your options. Worth the time for me. The touch screen seems slightly off from buttons shown.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Temple

customer_reviews.title: Worst setup - it doesn't even gets to be recognized by pc or mac
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the silhouette cameo 3 and bluetooth it is not recognized by my pc neither by my mac. I have been trying to make it work for the last 5 hours. Even in my phone and ipad the usb does not show (it is enabled). Im really dissapointed, it seems im not the only one but still not any concrete solution. Really a nighmare and i had work to do with it. Now i dont know how to return it since i brought it home out of the USA. Really a big shame.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: It cut perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to cut my stencils, never has fail on me so far, and I use it a lot. Very please with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for graphic designers
customer_reviews.text: My biggest issue was being able to bring in my own designs. I can easily bring in an object from Photoshop or Illustrator. Using this to create designs for glass etching is perfect for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a cameo 3 I purchased 2 years ago. Unfortunately the old machine did not work correctly from day 1. touchscreen did not function most of the time and the Bluetooth rarely connected. The new machine works great, touch screen blue tooth and all.
customer_reviews.author: quadgirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product a lot at home. It has increased our home made stuff and helps my family creativity to improve the ideas. Great product and excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marco A. Alvarez Rengifo

customer_reviews.title: Paper weight
customer_reviews.text: I heard that this product was easy to use, which is why I purchased it. Many hours later, and after fiddling with tons of settings, it still can't cut or do the shape of the letters like it is supposed to. The system is also not user friendly. It's basically a $200 paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How the machine works
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this machine is it’s very easy to setup and use when you register the machine on its website you get some items for free.. and on the other hand I think you could have gotten gotten better cutting Matt’s and weaving tools for the price but over all I have no complaints what so ever
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Very excited and happy with my machine
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my cameo soo far! It had arrived ALOT sooner then I had expected (so I was VERY surprised!!) The price was a good price, VERY pleased with this person(s) I have ordered from and I would recommend this person to order from.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Smadello

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Somehow heavier then I thought and very large. I was planning to travel with it and took all my suitcase space
customer_reviews.author: BelL Belahouel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Iv watched alot of videos on YouTube about how to use it... very helpful.. they teach you how to use it.. I'm in love...
customer_reviews.author: Kris May

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: If you are already familiar with Silhouette cameo, then this is an easy upgrade. Very logical and easy to use up graded features, and it is so much faster!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner printer
customer_reviews.text: There are better options out there for pros, but as a novice I LOVE this printer. I just do basic projects for the family.
customer_reviews.author: PCGUY

customer_reviews.title: 😍
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! It's so much fun, and has made life so much easier. This machine allows me to complete tshirt and decal jobs all in house. Great buy. It's so easy to learn how to use, and there are plenty of resources out there to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: from older model to newer model, love the silhouette machine so so much
customer_reviews.text: Owned the older version, researched a bunch before deciding whether to go with the more popular Cricut, or a silhouette again, and ultimately loved my old machine so much I went with it again. And so happy I did. Pic of most recent project I used it for. Can’t speak on the circuit, but I love love the silhouette machine and it’s software.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: Love. Love. Love. This machine has me addicted to crafting and I'm not a crafter lol. The possibilities are endless with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: melissa masias

customer_reviews.title: Right size and price.
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered exactly as promised. Would be great if the maker included a small starter pamphlet. But everything is digital these days. But the service was fast, the machine works an I have not had a chance to make much with it yet. I do recommend joining an online group/community to learn the ins and out of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wood

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful craft tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Definitely has a learning curve but once you figure it out (you tube is your friend!) you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: CM Fleck

customer_reviews.title: Don't Use The Mat!
customer_reviews.text: So far everything seems to be running smoothly., I deducted 1 star for the mat. It's not as sticky as other mats and makes the paper slide off, forming chaos during mid cut. The mat is laughable.
customer_reviews.author: Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for Daughter- not quite like the description.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters as she has an Etsy shop and does have the original one. She said this one she is not sure about and the Blue Tooth is not compatible with their product. She said it was difficult to operate and thought about returning it but is trying to figure it out. Her original one is still working but she wanted this one so she can two orders at the same time and double her productivity. I hope it pans out for her and she decides to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Lovee 2

customer_reviews.title: Learning, patience, learning
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I am a little unhappy with is having to search YouTube for videos on how to operate the Cameo3. There should be a training manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome machine which comes with ZERO instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine which comes with ZERO instructions. They would like you to pay to learn how to use it. A simple start up guide would save new users hours of frustration and ruined materials. You Tube videos are the only way to learn to use it for free.. That said, the possibilities of this machine are endless. company support is the problem.
customer_reviews.author: L. T. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Bought in February, started to use in March. Now May and already broke!! I have never been able to cut anything because it’s ether don’t cut the paper through or rips my paper because sticks to strong to the mat!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiya

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter...
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box...with that said we have the first Cameo so we were ahead of the game...if this is your first cutter it might be a little intimidating at first...so your research and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Perry

customer_reviews.title: It will break quite easily, no returns
customer_reviews.text: I used the machine for about a month weekly to make some cuts, and one day it just wouldnt turn back on. In theory the machine is great, but there's no returns and so once it dies, it's useless. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kashte K

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It works like a dream. I am still learning but love it.
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Long time user of silhouette. Finally upgraded to the 3! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linzirae

customer_reviews.title: Horrible company and misleading
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this company or product. I purchased this item for a gift and due to holiday/college schedule she didn’t get it until it was past the 30 days. When purchased i thought Bluetooth meant it would work off of multiple devices. Wrong. Only a computer. The company refused to take it back after my daughter opened it and found out it wouldn’t work from her phone.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Affordable prize for a good equipment
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! My daughter is a teacher and she loves this
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: I started a business with just this
customer_reviews.text: Started making and selling decals online and this is all I need
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: The machine worked great until the warranty period was over
customer_reviews.text: The machine worked great until the warranty period was over. Print and Cut feature is very faulty, resulting in countless dollars of wasted vinyl in the few months since the machine has been in use. It seems we are trying every project multiple times and settle for the best result. Customer service offered mundane suggestions that were not able to improve functionality. Extremely disappointing overall. I gave two stars because I like the idea of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase This Silhouette
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product. I have had the original cameo for over 4 years. It finally went out, so I purchased this silhouette. I have only used it for about 4 weeks and the display screen on the cameo went dark. I can barely read the display screen. Do NOT purchase this cameo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cameo 3 just isn't not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Silhouette is impossible to contact and does not comes as stated. The package is very oversized and created the worst shipping experience ever for me. I originally wanted Cameo 4!! Which still hasn't been released?! I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Harlan Burnett

customer_reviews.title: AutoBlade DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a year. It is hit or miss. Some days its fine and then the next project I start its butchering my paper (or vinyl). The "autoblade" setting is completely faulty. I am waiting for a response from the company. I have replaced my blade multiple times AND follow the directions closely for choosing the correct media setting.
customer_reviews.author: kman

customer_reviews.title: Great seller.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Alot of product use info online. The little engine that could! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hector  Conde

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: It's been so fun creating everything I want from signs to T-Shirts! I use my machine all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not have everything it offers
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, there was only the machine. I do not work the cable for electricity, I do not work the blade for cutting, I do not work the carpet I am very disappointed to have made this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Henry Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Works very good cutting vinyl stencils for electro engraving
customer_reviews.text: Works very good cutting vinyl stencils for electro engraving. I’m sure it can do so much more but that’s all at this time I’m using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Have to buy extra tools and such to make it work
customer_reviews.text: Kinda bummed there was no book on how to use with it. Especially a useful tip one for say what materials require what tension.
customer_reviews.author: katy c.

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: The cable messed up after having it for two weeks but other than that it works fine. The need guided videos to learn it better though.
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Love this cutter
customer_reviews.text: Always something new to learn, So many different things that can be done
customer_reviews.author: R Bart

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter
customer_reviews.text: A little bit louder than I expected, but really easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.author: pealpizar

customer_reviews.title: Came in great condition. It takes a bit to get used ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in great condition. It takes a bit to get used to but I'm loving how it cuts my stickers for my planners.
customer_reviews.author: Yashira Marie

customer_reviews.title: Looses Bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: Will not connect to Bluetooth. Tried to get in touch with someone about the warranty and still not heard anything from them. If warranty company would respond back that would be a plus. Bobby.houchin@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Bobby H

customer_reviews.title: Cuts great
customer_reviews.text: A lot to learn as far as the software. But Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Candy J

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!!! Getting small business off the ground with my silhouette.
customer_reviews.author: adriane

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have the original Silhouette Cameo but wanted to upgrade to the new machine. I use it for cutting paper and vinyl. I like the touch screen feature and the option to cut slightly wider pieces. I have been disappointed with the automatic blade so far. My vinyl was not cutting correctly so I switched back to the normal blade and no longer had issues. I will try buying another automatic blade to see if maybe it was just an issue with the one that came with my machine or if the machine itself is not adjusting correctly. I am happy with my purchase and Amazon certainly had the best price online.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Machine works perfectly and has continued to work perfectly. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal

customer_reviews.title: A great multipurpose Silhouette!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say?? It is a Silhouette at it’s best so far. Get your creative bug a boost! Great product with tons of YouTube video instructions.
customer_reviews.author: mark j porter

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: this came w/ no directions and not all the cutting parts very frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Betti Jo

product_meta.title: Silhouette Wireless Cutting Machine-AutoBlade-Dual Carriage-Studio Software, 12, CAMEO 3 - Classic White Edition
product_meta.description: Color:Cameo 3 - Classic White EditionThe Silhouette cameo include a 12 inch cutting mat, cutting blade, 51 exclusive cuttable designs and $10 gift card to the Silhouette online store Includes access to thousands of downloadable designs; Includes pc and Mac compatible software cuts up to 12-inch wide and 10-feet long; cuts a variety of materials from vinyl to fabric great for scrapbook layouts, cards, custom apparel, vinyl decor, etched glass, sketch designs, and paper crafts intricate cuts, precision duplication, and smooth edges make the Silhouette the perfect tool for paper crafting projects
feature_bullets: Cuts a variety of material including vinyl, paper, cardstock, fabric, and other materials up to 12 inches wide and 10 feet long.
Use the powerful Silhouette Studio design software to create your projects. Features Bluetooth technology for wireless cutting or plugs into your home computer.
Features a dual-carriage for multi-tool use and a higher 2 mm clearance to cut thicker materials. Is compatible with Print & Cut and PixScan technology.
Is the only Silhouette compatible with the self-adjusting AutoBlade.
Includes Silhouette CAMEO cutting machine, Silhouette Studio software, power cable and USB cable, 12-Inch Cutting Mat, AutoBlade cutting blade
